content.question: For which of the following distributions is the proportion of values between <math alttext="900" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>900</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> the greatest?

choices.label: A normal distribution with mean <math alttext="900" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>900</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and standard deviation <math alttext="100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

A normal distribution with mean <math alttext="950" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>950</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and standard deviation <math alttext="100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

A normal distribution with mean <math alttext="800" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>800</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and standard deviation <math alttext="100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

A normal distribution with mean <math alttext="1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and standard deviation <math alttext="400" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>400</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

A normal distribution with mean <math alttext="950" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>950</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and standard deviation <math alttext="50" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: A normal distribution with mean <math alttext="950" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>950</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and standard deviation <math alttext="50" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
